FuncDef:
The description command in the traffic policy view, you can add a description to the current traffic policy to indicate the specific configuration and use of the traffic policy.
The undo description command deletes the description of the traffic policy.
By default, there is no description adding for the current configured traffic policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the use of the traffic policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters that may include spaces.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-trafficpolicy-tp1] description This policy is a test traffic policy
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the name of a traffic policy cannot provide the detailed information about the traffic policy, you can add the detailed information through the description command.
Prerequisites
A traffic policy is defined and the traffic policy view is displayed.
